text: Mi bharyalu miku pantapolala vanti varu, kavuna mi polalaku miru korina vidhanga povaccu. Mariyu mi svayam koraku (satkaryalu) cesi pampandi (miku manci santanam koraku prarthincandi). Mariyu allah yandu bhayabhaktulu kaligi undandi. Mariyu miru niscayanga ayananu kalasukovalasi undani telusukondi. Mariyu visvasulaku subhavartalanu vinipincu
